body.name: WiFi Extender Signal Booster for Home, WiFi Range Extender,Repeater with Ethernet Port, Coverage Up to 9998 Square Feet, 1-Tap Setup, Wireless Internet Repeater
features: 【High Speed】WiFi Extender will expand the existing wireless network to hard to reach areas, speed up to 300mbps, create high-speed, remote and stable network and well performance.Compact design,does not take up much space.

【Easy to Set Up】You can use PC/smartphone/laptop to set up. (Smartphone settings are simpler), connect to WiFi, enter the password to complete the setting.Clear and no challenging installation process, there is instruction with the package box，easy to set up wifi extenders signal booster.

【Repeater Mode/AP Mode】Wi-Fi Extender has Repeater/AP mode, Ethernet Port can easily turn your wired Internet connection into a wireless access point. most home users will set it up in one of two ways: Range extender (it connects to your existing wireless network wirelessly and enhances/extends the signal) or Access Point (it connects to the Internet or your existing network via Ethernet and then broadcasts the wireless signal.

【More Zones】Spots in rooms,basement，garage，bedroom， with weak WiFi coverage with our WiFi range extender. Please note :the WiFi repeater only extends WiFi coverage and does not speed up the original router or maintain the same speed as the original router.(When using repeater Mode, the router speed may be reducedas the distance increases)

【Safe Internet Environment】This Wifi extender can maximize network security, ensure your network safety problem. It plays an effective role in preventing others from stealing your network, protecting your important data, and avoiding Wi-Fi interference and privacy issues.Supports Wireless Security: WPA/WPA2. Ideal for home, company and travel in use.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.8 4.8 out of 5 stars 15,604 ratings 4.8 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Features: Wireless broadband access up to 300 Mbps. Easily boost your router WiFi signal. Easy installation instructions make installation quick and easy. Supports repeater and AP modes, supports wireless and wired connectivity. Universally compliant with IEEE 802.11n, IEEE 802.11g and IEEE 802.11b standards. High penetrability through two walls, reliable data transmission for a large house. The WiFi extender booster compact size and wall-mounted design facilitate flexible installation and movement, making it very suitable for home / travel / office use.

How to use： 1. Find and connect to Wi-Fi"Repeater-xxxx” 2. Then it will automatically jump to setting page after connecting 3. Select Repeater Mode 4. Select your target network's SSID ENTER it's password and connect.(if it a hidden network, you need to add it manually.) 5. Click the "Finish" button to complete the relay mode configuration. 6. Complete Repeater Mode setting. Package included: 1 x WiFi Booster, 1x Network cable, 1 x Quick Installation Guide

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to set up with surprisingly good boost for the money. I bought a much more expensive unit initially and after taking over an hour to set up I got a very weak signal to an out building I have. With this little gem I pressed two buttons and it was good to go. Wifi is good in the building and other dead spots in my back yard. Sending other unit back

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic fast boot up time very simple to install
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic fast boot up time very simple to install. No hassle, works right out of box. Very nice Samsung

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2017
reviews.reviewText: So far, so good. It's an easy install using their software. Just remember to buy the cable needed to connect it to a USB port for the transfer of data from your HDD. Also, if you intend to keep the HDD as a second disk, you might need another SATA cable. Also, if you try to use the old HDD as a second disk your system might boot up on it if you don't remove the operating system from it, but only after you have transferred everything to the new SSD.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Another reliable Samsung product purchase.
reviews.reviewText: The cloning software is top notch. Smooth and quick. My only real regret so far is that I wasn't able to afford a higher capacity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars new life to an old laptop
reviews.reviewText: My laptop must be at least 8 years old. It was slow. I was thinking about replacing this slow laptop but was hesitant due to the software installed. Spoke with computer tech and was recommended to try replacing the old drive with SD Drive. Worked like magic. Old laptop is now a turbo top and it also eliminated the overheating which used to kill my drives every couple of years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfect. It is unbelievably fast at boot up
reviews.reviewText: Works perfect. It is unbelievably fast at boot up. The SSD is just as the reviews I've read described. I am very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get you some!
reviews.reviewText: I cannot say enough about this HD. I buy at least a 6 per month and each time I install one, I have very happy customers. I wish that I was not limited to just 3 at a time. It is a shame, all that empty space in a box for only 3 lonely drives. I would be more than happy to put 7 more of their friends in there if I could.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars this was recommended by a co-worker
reviews.reviewText: I was experiencing a hard drive failure, this was recommended by a co-worker. It was easy to install, configure and install Windows 10. It's like having a new laptop again!

reviews.reviewTitle: Fifth SSD from Samsung, would not buy any other
reviews.reviewText: Tried two other manufacturers SSDs but none compare to the quality and speed of Samsung. This is the fifth I buy and would not buy fro any other manufacturer.

Ho acquistato il Samsung Memorie MZ-75E250B/EU SSD 850 EVO da diversi mesi e sono rimasto davvero soddisfatto della sua performance e della sua affidabilità. Si tratta di un prodotto di vecchio modello, ma ancora molto valido e performante.L'installazione è stata davvero semplice, grazie al kit di montaggio incluso nella confezione, che mi ha permesso di installare il disco senza alcun problema nel mio computer. La compatibilità con la mia configurazione è stata immediata e senza alcun tipo di incompatibilità.La velocità di lettura e scrittura del Samsung Memorie MZ-75E250B/EU SSD 850 EVO è davvero sorprendente: le applicazioni si avviano in modo rapido e il caricamento dei file è istantaneo. Il tempo di avvio del mio sistema operativo è notevolmente ridotto rispetto a quando utilizzavo un tradizionale hard disk.Inoltre, ho notato un significativo aumento delle prestazioni in caso di multitasking: le applicazioni si aprono più velocemente e il sistema non rallenta mai, anche quando ho più programmi aperti contemporaneamente.Il design del Samsung Memorie MZ-75E250B/EU SSD 850 EVO è davvero elegante e minimalista. Il colore nero/grigio si adatta perfettamente a qualsiasi tipo di configurazione del computer, senza dare fastidio estetico.In conclusione, consiglio il Samsung Memorie MZ-75E250B/EU SSD 850 EVO a tutti coloro che vogliono migliorare le prestazioni del loro computer e avere uno storage affidabile ed efficiente. Nonostante sia un modello di vecchia generazione, questa unità a stato solido non ha nulla da invidiare ai nuovi modelli presenti sul mercato.
Me llego rapidísimo y justo lo que esperaba, muy atentos para contestar mis preguntas. Mas barato que en tiendas locales, aprovechen cuando lo bajan de precio

Es un disco duro excelente: buenas velocidades de lectura y escritura, poco consumo de energía... Estadísticas aparte, la sensación general al trabajar con el ordenador (tiempos de encendido, apagado, carga de programas, copia de archivos) es muy buena. Ahora mismo es de lo mejor en relación-calidad precio en el mercado (113E, marzo 2015).Algunas cosas a tener en cuenta para aumentar el rendimiento:- El modo AHCI debe estar activado (lo puedes hacer desde la BIOS, pero lo normal es que ya lo tengas activado).- Instala el software que trae, Samsung Magician, para mí uno de los puntos fuertes de este disco y la principal diferencia con otras marcas como Crucial. Puedes configurar el disco a tu gusto sin ser un experto, eligiendo entre rendimiento, capacidad o durabilidad. Además, es muy sencillo de usar ya que lo hace casi todo de forma automática.- Activa el TRIM (por defecto activado en los sistemas operativos más recientes). Esta opción permite que el disco duro marque los bloques que ya no están uso para poder eliminarlos y volverlos a usar, evitando la ralentización del disco y alargando su vida media. Si te quieres asegurar de que esté activada, ejecuta la opción Performance Optimization en el software Magician, que además hace de TRIM virtual si tu sistema no lo soporta.- Por último, si quieres sacarle todo el partido activa el Over Provisioning. Perderás el 10% de espacio de disco, pero lo notarás en el rendimiento y además, también mejora la durabilidad del disco. En cuanto al modo RAPID hay algo más de controversia, mejora los resultados en los tests pero no está claro si es tan efectivo en el uso diario, y algunos usuarios lo tachan de puro marketing, yo de momento lo tengo desactivado.En resumen: buen disco duro, buena relación calidad-precio, y sobre todo buen soporte con el software incluido, lo que permite que le saques todo el rendimiento sin ser un experto en informática.
